translations: v.（用机器）切碎，绞碎；装腔作势地小步快走；矫揉做作地说
n.<英>绞碎的肉，肉末（尤指牛肉）（=ground beef）

sentences.sentence: The history of the mince pie may have contributed to its unusual reputation.
sentences.translation: 肉馅饼的历史可能是它不寻常的声誉的部分原因。

sentences.sentence: Simple wrist-twist motion activates sharp blades that will quickly mince even large quantities of herbs.
sentences.translation: 简单的扭手腕动作就能使锋利的刀片迅速切碎大量的药草。

sentences.sentence: Use this knife to chop, slice and mince; the side of the blade can be used for crushing garlic and some spices.
sentences.translation: 用这刀剁碎、切片或切碎物体；刀片侧面可以用于压碎大蒜和一些香料。
